arm_group.description: Subjects will receive a single dose of ASP1941 under fasting condition
Subjects will receive a single dose of ASP1941 before meal
Subjects will receive a single dose of ASP1941 after meal

brief_summary.textblock:
This study is to investigate the effect of food on the pharmacokinetics, the
      pharmacodynamics and safety of ASP1941 after administration of  ASP1941 in healthy
      non-elderly adult male subjects.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Investigate the Effect of Food on the Absorption, Distribution and Elimination of ASP1941

detailed_description.textblock:
This will be a randomized, open-label, 3-way crossover design study to investigate the
      effect of food on the pharmacokinetics, the pharmacodynamics and safety of ASP1941 after
      administration of ASP1941 in healthy non-elderly adult male subjects. Each subject will
      receive a single dose of ASP1941 "under fasting condition", "before meal" and "after meal".

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Healthy as judged by the investigator/subinvestigator based on the results of
             physical examinations and laboratory tests

          -  Body weight ; ≥50.0 kg, <80.0 kg

          -  Body Mass Index ; ≥17.6, <26.4

          -  Written informed consent has been obtained

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Received any investigational drugs within 120 days before the screening assessment

          -  Donated 400 mL of whole blood within 90 days, 200 mL of whole blood within 30 days,
             or d components within 14 days before the screening assessment

          -  Received medication within 7 days before hospital admission

          -  A deviation from the assessment criteria of physical examinations or laboratory tests
             at screening or upon admission

          -  History of drug allergies

          -  With renal, hepatic, gastrointestinal, heart, cerebrovascular or respiratory diseases

clinical_study.official_title: A Pharmacokinetic Study to Investigate the Effect of Food on the Pharmacokinetics of ASP1941

oversight_info.authority: Japan: Pharmaceuticals and Medical Devices Agency

primary_outcome.description: Area under the curve (AUC) from time 0 extrapolated to infinity (AUCinf), AUC from time of dosing to last quantifiable concentration (AUClast ), and maximum concentration (Cmax)
primary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics (PK) profiles of ASP1941 (in plasma): AUCinf, AUClast and Cmax

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: Time to attain Cmax (tmax) , apparent terminal elimination half-life (t1/2 )
secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics (PK) profiles of ASP1941 (in plasma): tmax, t1/2, apparent distribution volume, apparent body clearance
Safety assessed by incidence of adverse event, vital signs, 12-lead ECG and laboratory tests

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before and for 72 hours after each administration

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Pharmacokinetics/Dynamics Study, Intervention Model: Crossover Assignment, Masking: Open Label
